name: genomeassembler-long-read-assembly
title: Genome Assembler: Long-Read Assembly & Scaffolding
description: Complete genome assembly pipeline for haploid/unphased genomes from long reads (ONT/PacBio HiFi) with assembly via flye/hifiasm, polishing with medaka/pilon, scaffolding using LINKS/Longstitch/RagTag, and comprehensive quality control with BUSCO/QUAST/merqury.
content:
Genome Assembler: Long-Read Assembly

Comprehensive pipeline for assembling, polishing, and scaffolding haploid or diploid inbred genomes from Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) or PacBio HiFi long reads.

Assembly & Polishing Workflow

  • Assembly Options: Choose between Flye (ONT-optimized) or Hifiasm (HiFi-optimized) assemblers
  • Polishing: Medaka for ONT reads or Pilon for short-read polishing
  • Scaffolding: LINKS, Longstitch, or RagTag (reference-guided) for improving contiguity
  • Quality Control: BUSCO completeness, QUAST assembly metrics, and Merqury accuracy assessment

Key Features

  • Long-Read Optimized: Designed for ONT and PacBio HiFi sequencing technologies
  • Flexible Assembly: Multiple assembler options to match your data type
  • Comprehensive QC: Gene completeness, assembly statistics, and base-level accuracy
  • Reference-Guided: Optional scaffolding with reference genomes using RagTag

Input Requirements

Samplesheet (CSV format) with columns:

  • sample: Sample identifier
  • ontreads: Path to ONT reads (optional)
  • hifireads: Path to HiFi reads (optional)
  • ref_fasta: Reference genome for scaffolding (optional)
  • shortread_F/R: Short reads for polishing (optional)

Key Outputs

  • Assembled Genome: FASTA files with contigs/scaffolds
  • Assembly Metrics: N50, L50, total length, number of contigs
  • BUSCO Results: Gene completeness assessment
  • QUAST Report: Comprehensive assembly statistics
  • Merqury QC: Base-level accuracy and kmer analysis
  • MultiQC Report: Integrated quality control summary

Important Notes

  • Genome Type: Designed for haploid or diploid inbred genomes
  • Not Supported: Polyploid genome phasing, HiC scaffolding
  • Resource Requirements: Large genomes require substantial compute resources

Perfect for: De novo genome assembly • Long-read sequencing projects • Plant/animal genome projects • Microbial genome assembly • Reference genome construction
